name: Waiting or hiding
description:
This is an interactive poetry submission for SubQjam 2019. You can check out other entries here:  https://itch.io/jam/subqjam-2019/entries

I would recommend "playing" through a few times to see the different poems - there are 5 versions, and you can see them all in 5/10 minutes.

I was working on another entry when the idea for a small poetry project around climate action came to me.  Inspired by the idea of spoken word poetry, I added music to fit the type of beat I woukld imagine this spoken to.

In the spirit of the competition, I tried to keep this project as concise as possible.

Music included by "Lakey Inspired - Blue Boi [Lofi]" - you can check out the song at the Youtube link below.

Link: https://youtu.be/wnOoqdcf7zU
